org.apache.taverna.reference

Interface ReferenceSetDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InMemoryReferenceSetDao

    public interface ReferenceSetDao
    Data Access Object interface for ReferenceSet. Used by the ReferenceSetService to store and retrieve implementations of reference set to and from the database. Client code should use the reference set service rather than using this Dao directly.

    All methods throw DaoException, and nothing else. Where a deeper error is propagated it is wrapped in a DaoException and passed on to the caller.

    Author:
    Tom Oinn

    • Method Detail

      • store

        @Transactional(propagation=REQUIRED,
               readOnly=false)
void store(ReferenceSet rs)
                                                                        throws DaoException
        Store the specified new reference set
        Parameters:
        rs - a reference set, must not already exist in the database.
        Throws:
        DaoException - if the entry already exists in the database or some other database related problem occurs

        @Transactional(propagation=REQUIRED,
               readOnly=false)
void update(ReferenceSet rs)
                                                                         throws DaoException
        Update a pre-existing entry in the database
        Parameters:
        rs - the reference set to update. This must already exist in the database
        Throws:
        DaoException

      • get

        @Transactional(propagation=SUPPORTS,
               readOnly=true)
ReferenceSet get(T2Reference ref)
                                                                             throws DaoException
        Fetch a reference set by id
        Parameters:
        ref - the T2Reference to fetch
        Returns:
        a retrieved ReferenceSet
        Throws:
        DaoException - if the supplied reference is of the wrong type or if something goes wrong fetching the data or connecting to the database
